turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a coffee from starbucks today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, where will you be getting it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Wealthy Street in Grand Rapids

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, so what are you getting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cordusio

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A tall

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any specific instructions for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it with almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll be sure to add that. And what time will you be picking it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 3:00 pm today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, are you okay with using the same credit card you have used? The visa?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have you down for a tall cordusio with almond milk for pickup at 3pm today at the Starbuck on wealthy street in grand rapids, paying with your visa card. is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you add a grande Americano for my wife?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done, anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, the order will be ready for pick up at 3.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you
